formatDescription: The Softimage 3D Picture format is a native raster image format of Autodesk's Softimage 3D computer graphics application. A full technical description of the format can be found in the Internet Archive: https://web.archive.org/web/20160802085201/http://softimage.wiki.softimage.com/index.php/?title=PIC_file_format
